concept.title: Example: Single ditavalref as a child of map
concept.shortdesc: Using a ditavalref element as a direct child of the map element is equivalent to setting global filtering conditions for the map.

example.p: The following map is equivalent to processing all the contents of the map with the conditions in the novice.ditaval document. If additional conditions are provided externally (for example, as a parameter to the publishing process), those conditions take precedence.
